column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////We ate in the cellar and that will be our dining stable in the future
column2: a speakeasy if there was one. Our server was fantastic
column3: he provided excellent service by never leaving us wanting but also never overstaying his welcome
column4: a perfect balance of service. He helped guide me through some wines and paired them expertly with my food selections. My partner enjoyed several mixed which were well balanced and fresh.
